trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of input that the grammar, defined by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>, will match.
trans-unit.target: Indica o tipo de entrada que a gramática definida pelo <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>, fará a correspondência.

trans-unit.source: The input mode for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> is determined by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O modo de entrada para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>é determinado pelo seu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The default input mode is Voice, which indicates that the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: O modo de entrada padrão é de voz, o que indica que a gramática definida pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>corresponderá a entrada de fala.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The Dtmf mode indicates that a grammar will match Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) tones instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: O modo de Dtmf indica que uma gramática corresponderá tons de multi-frequência tom Dual (DTMF) em vez de fala.

trans-unit.source: There are 16 DTMF tones, 12 of which are commonly found on most telephones.
trans-unit.target: Há 16 tons DTMF, 12, que geralmente são encontrados na maioria dos telefones.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object will match the type of input specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property, which gets an instance of SrgsGrammarMode.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>do objeto de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto corresponderá ao tipo de entrada especificado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>propriedade, que obtém uma instância de SrgsGrammarMode.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object will match DTMF tones similar to those found on a telephone, instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> objeto corresponderá tons DTMF semelhantes àqueles encontrados em um telefone, em vez de fala.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> objeto corresponderá a entrada de fala.
